short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a block button next to profile avatars on X (Twitter).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily block users with one click to restore a healthy social media. There is a new block button directly beneath the user avatar in the timeline. Be careful to not block the wrong person. You can alternatively enable confirmation before blocking in the settings (New entry in regular X/Twitter settings at the bottom).

The behavior of the block button is the same as doing it manually, just that the extension navigates and clicks the menu for you. 

Features:
- Enable confirmation dialogue before blocking a person
- Change block button colors to your likings
